title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON, TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING (MOU) WITH THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES-TASK FORCE UGNAY, 2ND INFANTRY DIVISION, PHILIPPINE ARMY REGARDING THE RENEWAL OF YHE DECLARATION OF STABLE PEACE AND SECURITY (SIPS) IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS, LAGUNA.
